meanings.sent1: The resurfacers arrived early to fix the road.
meanings.sent2: The resurfacers did a great job on the driveway.
meanings.sent3: The resurfacers were so efficient, they finished in record time.
meanings.sent4: The resurfacers were like busy bees, buzzing around the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The resurfacers were the heroes of the neighborhood, saving everyone from bumpy roads.
